thread.title: Singer CeeLo Green reveals he’s been engaged for 1 year to longtime girlfriend Shani James
thread.title_full: Singer CeeLo Green reveals he’s been engaged for 1 year to longtime girlfriend Shani James

author: News Staff
title: Singer CeeLo Green reveals he’s been engaged for 1 year to longtime girlfriend Shani James
text:
by The Associated Press Posted Oct 23, 2015 11:50 am EDT 
NEW YORK, N.Y. – Recording a new album isn’t the only thing CeeLo Green has done in the last year: The singer revealed that he also proposed to his longtime girlfriend. 
Green, 41, told People magazine that he’s been engaged to Shani James, 38, for about a year. A representative for the Grammy winner confirmed the engagement on Friday. 
Green will release a new album, “Heart Blanche,” on Nov. 6. 
The former “Voice” coach said he and James didn’t want to promote their engagement. 
“We’re a collective power together because our private life is sacred. But you know … maybe it is time for the world to know that I have a very secure situation and a loving woman supporting me the entire way,” he said. 
Green was previously married to Christina Johnson. Join the conversation Sign in to comment (not connected to your Insider Club login). You're logged in as Loading profile... Unexpected error.
